alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Forest; Greene; Indiana; Jefferson; Venango; Washington; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 9:37AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN VENANGO...EASTERN BUTLER...ALLEGHENY...JEFFERSON...CENTRAL GREENE...ARMSTRONG... CLARION...FAYETTE...FOREST...SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON...INDIANA... WESTMORELAND AND NORTHEASTERN PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 AM EDT... At 937 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking rain showers along a line extending from 8 miles east of Oil City to 9 miles west of Waynesburg. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pittsburgh, Penn Hills, Mount Lebanon, Bethel Park, Ross Township, McCandless Township, Monroeville, McMurray, Greensburg, McKeesport, Indiana, and Washington. This includes the following highways... Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 29 and 31. Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 18 and 57. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 36 and 100. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 8 and 38, and between mile markers 41 and 60. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 45 and 96. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 63 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
